articles.title: Kids Found to Have Antibodies That Could Protect Against COVID-19 - India.com
articles.description: Children are much more likely to have cross-reactive antibodies than adults. Read on.
articles.content: Scientists have found that some people, notably children, have antibodies reactive to SARS-CoV-2 in their blood, despite not ever having being infected with the virus. Also Read - Delhi Air Pollution… [+2590 chars]
